Name: Hawkesbury City Council Library, Local Studies Collection

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 10am-7pm; Sat 9am-1pm; Sun 2-5pm; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, microfilms and newspapers. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit required if using the photograph collection or the Council records. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Collect material about the Hawkesbury District, both past and present.

About.Major holdings: Various individuals/bodies: Pamphlet collection (18m); Church and cemetery records (2m); Environmental impact studies 1970's- (2m); Church registers (0.5m); Photograph collection 1870- (2m). Walker Solicitors: Correspondence, wills, day books 1800s-1960 (2.5m). Hawkesbury City Council: Minute/Rate books etc 1873- (84m). Published books (43m).

About.Guides: Nichols, Michelle (compiler), Guide to the Local Studies Collection. Hawkesbury City Council Library Service, 1997.
